segments.text: The scene is a simple kitchen with cabinets and a sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Daylight filters in, showing the tidy garden beyond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands drying dishes, apron on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, basin full, water edging over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming at her feet on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinet reveals the cookie jar stuffed with treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbs stool, one hand grabbing, other holding plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool wobbles, but he persists upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm extended in hopeful wait.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a secret moment of fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Contrast to the unaware adult nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow could lead to slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Makes me think of how quickly things can go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside mirrors what should be inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll catch them in time.
segments.speaker: PAR
